title: B2B SaaS: Latest Monthly News, Videos and Events | Similarweb
description: Keep up to date on the world of B2B SaaS from Similarweb, including the latest news, blog posts, videos, event details, and podcasts. Get this month's update.
content: HomeBlogSalesB2B SalesThe Similarweb SaaS Digest - August 2022 Sales Intelligence The Similarweb SaaS Digest – August 2022 Sign up for free lead lists by Shelly Skandrani 2 Min. August 7, 2022 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Welcome to our latest SaaS digest… it’s your one-minute monthly update of what’s new in the SaaS world. Download: The Software Industry Traffic Benchmarks Guide Find out what’s really happening in the software industry with the traffic data that will expose growth opportunities, growing markets, successful marketing channels and more. Yes the industry has seen some turmoil this year, but while worldwide traffic to the industry decreased – 43% of the companies on our list grew their website traffic month-over-month in June 2022. Get the insights to mirror the success of these companies. " > Download now Learn: 8 Top ABM platforms in 2022 Account-based marketing software is a game changer for any sales strategy. ABM software will speed up your sales cycle, and ultimately get you better results with personalized content, automated outreach, and aligned sales and marketing efforts. We’ve done the research for you and hand-picked the top ones, so take a bite and let the leads roll in. Get the goods → Read: 25 ABM statistics you should probably (/definitely) know If you just skipped the last article, think again. Here are the 25 astonishing account-based marketing statistics to prove exactly why you should be incorporating it into your marketing efforts. This, now mainstream approach, has several different tactics to aid in business growth, and the statistics are all here to show you how. Read now → Download: ALL fastest growing ecommerce companies list – July 2022 Here’s a list of the up-and-comers in the ecommerce world. You can use this list to target prospects or to learn about your new competitors. The list links to their profiles on the Similarweb platform, so you can find out their digital traffic data, their successes and their pain points. " > Download the list Upcoming SaaS events And last but not least – there are stacks of SaaS events taking place over the next few months, and we’ve taken the time to collate a handy list of the top ones, just for you. You can take a peek below, of you can download and update our H2 events and marketing calendar right here. That’s it for now – see you next month, same place, and until then…stay SaaSy, people! Your Sales Advantage Grab your prospects' attention with insights from Similarweb Sales Intelligence. Book a live demo by Shelly Skandrani Shelly Skandrani has 15 years of experience in content creation and filmmaking. She studied screenwriting at UCLA and theater at Beit Zvi.
